channel.title: ToL with Steam achievements! My ideas [Added a few more]
channel.description:
Hi! Im **Alan#7191** !
Throne of lies can use achievements for steam, so the players can get a chance to collect every single one of them!
Here is some archievement suggestions:
**Plan B:** Start a game as Neutral Killer, then win it being the Psycho King.
**Golden Prince** Use your 3 execution charges without killing any Blue Dragon member.
**Just one is boring** Change class at least 3 times in one game
**Dont mess with my target** As Mercenary, protect your target from being attacked and make him pay with Rebound in the same game
**Evil Desire** Win as Cult Leader/Mastermind without getting any other member dead in the game (Evil King counts as member)
**Expert Killer** Kill 4 people in the same game without dying
**Nope** Get occupied/redirected 3 times in the same game and get immunity
**More fun with friends** Play a game with 3 or more friends
**Soul Collector** Collect 6 souls as Reaper
**They never saw that coming** As Sorcerer, use Circle of Death to kill 2 or more players in 1 night.
**Did you really say that?** Use trollbox on someone as the Fool/Scorned and get them killed by the court in the same day.
**Loyalty is rewarded** Get protection from the king 2 or more times in the same game
**Peace is winning** Win a game as a Killer class without killing anyone
**Totally not deliberate** As Butler, Poison the Evil King and make him die by that
**Gotcha!** Find 2 or more Cult/Unseen members in the same game as the Paladin/Sheriff
**Who needs chemistry?** Win a game as Alchemist without using Stoneskin potion
**Expert Deceit** Get accused of treason 2 or more times and get pardoned in the same game as an Evil faction
**Revenge is mine** As Scorned, get both 2 objectives killed by the court
**EDIT: New achievement ideas!**
**Survivor** Stay alive until Day 10
**We cant lose the hope** Win a game as BD with both the Prince and the starting Good King already dead
**Cold Killer** As a Knight, cold steel 3 non-Blue Dragon players in the same game
**Neutrals united, never beaten** Win a game as neutral, but all the other neutrals also have to win (BD and Cult/Unseen needs to be defeated by the NK)
**Unstoppable** Win a game as Blue Dragon with no Blue Dragon deaths (Good King included)
**Red court** Have 4 Cult members and an Evil King alive at the same time
**Violet court** Have 3 Unseen members and an Evil King alive at the same time
**That was fast** Win a game on Night 1 or Day 2 as any class (Scorned,Fool and Inq allowed)
**Beer Tank** As a Drunk, redirect attacks to you 2 or more times in the same game
**Bad luck Bryan** Die Night 1.
**I need healing** Get healed 2 or more tiems in the same game
**The doctor is in** Heal Nightshade/Bleeding 3 times in the same game
**"Okay maybe it’d be best if you were satisfied with what you have already! SECRET ACHIEVEMENT**
Be Blue dragon, then Unseen class, then Assasin, Then Mastermind, Then Assasin And finally Evil King in the same game.
Hope you liked my idea. I would appreciate your feedback Also if my english is bad im so sorry, Im from Argentina :) and i love the game.
**EDIT: Fixed some achievements, thanks for the feedback on discord :D**
Good Night!

item.title: ToL with Steam achievements! My ideas [Added a few more]
item.dc:creator: Malvolio
item.description:
I like the idea of having achievements in the game. Since the dev team is so small, I am not sure how soon they would have resources (time) to do it though. But at a certain point, for sure.

Since this is a team game, I’d stay away from achievements that would motivate players to produce weird and bad gameplay such as

200 IQ play
Win as Cult Leader/Mastermind without getting any other member dead in the game

Especially experienced ones who could be more into achievements - to chase them instead of play to win. I like most of the neutral ones. The faction based ones need careful thinking through.

Read full topic
